title: Spacious Bedroom, Large Closet & Off-Street Parking - 2 Weeks Free
posting_body: 2840 EASTLAKE AVE E UNIT 617 | SEATTLE, WA 98102
South Coronado Apartments - Seattle Property Management Associates
The Coronado Apartments is in the desirable Eastlake neighborhood on a main bus line to Downtown, South Lake Union, and the University of Washington.
The Eastlake neighborhood is home to lots of great places to eat within walking distance and is convenient to Interstate 5 for those who need to commute for work.
The Coronado features updated kitchens with new cabinets, granite countertops and Wood Floors.
The units have large closets and spacious bedrooms.
Off street parking may be available for a separate fee.
This unit is being offered on a 12-month Lease with $50 w,s,g fee and 2 weeks free rent!
At the time of application, we require payment of the $25 application fee per person and a $1000 deposit that is then applied to the refundable security deposit upon approval.
This building is no smoking and no dogs, cats are allowed.
